articles.contents: About 20 Chinese humanoid robot companies debuted at CES 2026 in Las Vegas, significantly outnumbering competitors from the US, Japan, and Europe combined, showcasing advancements in hardware manufacturing and cost efficiency. The firms are targeting overseas markets through direct-to-consumer models while facing challenges including high shipping costs, complex supply chains, and different consumer expectations between Chinese and American markets.
articles.title: CES上，中国机器人军团想掏空海外买家的口袋

articles.contents: Humanoid AI company Lumos launched the 'FastUMI Pro Research Acceleration Program,' offering academic research paper awards of 30,000-50,000 CNY (4,000-7,000 USD) to researchers publishing papers using FastUMI Pro devices. The program also supports the ICRA WBCD 2026 dual-arm robot competition.
articles.title: 鹿明机器人推出“鹿明FastUMI Pro智研加速计划”

articles.contents: Segway-Ninebot unveiled five new lawn mower robot products at CES 2026, including the X4 flagship and H2 series with advanced positioning technology, introducing the 'Navimow standard' featuring 'Drop and Mow' capability across all models. The new products target various lawn sizes and terrain complexity levels with autonomous mapping and deployment features.
articles.title: 未岚大陆CES 2026发布五大新品，首次系统化提出“Navimow标准”

articles.contents: Alibaba Cloud released a multi-modal interaction development toolkit for AI hardware that integrates three foundational models (Qiwen, Wanxiang, Baize) and includes 10+ pre-built agents and MCP tools. The toolkit enables hearing, vision, thinking, and physical world interaction capabilities for applications in AI glasses, learning robots, companion toys, and intelligent robots.
articles.title: 阿里云推出面向AI硬件的多模态交互开发套件

articles.contents: JD.com established a 'Chameleon Business Unit' to develop its AI toy platform JoyAI, with a second batch of AI toys launching in mid-January targeting all age groups. The company's digital human avatars are deployed across livestreaming, customer service, travel, brand endorsement, esports commentary, and entertainment with 50,000+ active brand partnerships.
articles.title: 京东成立“变色龙业务部”，第二批自研AI玩具将于1月中旬全面上线

articles.contents: Zhihui Technology completed a 1.3 billion CNY Series C funding round led by Tsinghua Capital, attracting investors including Gaoxin Capital and Huaying Capital. The company develops wide-bandgap semiconductor and advanced power conversion technology for new energy vehicles, targeting battery thermal management, autonomous suspension, motor control, and ultra-fast charging applications.
articles.title: “致瞻科技”完成近3亿元C轮融资

articles.contents: Unable to generate summary - article content is behind paywall and contains only subscription information, not actual news content.
articles.title: Samsung forecasts record profit and signals sustained AI boom

articles.contents: Google and Character.AI, a 2021 startup providing AI chatbot companions that merged with Google for $2.7 billion in 2024, are settling lawsuits from families whose teenagers died by suicide after interacting with the platform's chatbots.
articles.title: Google and Character.AI negotiate first major settlements in teen chatbot death cases

articles.contents: Raonsecure announced plans to establish itself as a global leader in digital trust infrastructure by integrating AI-powered threat detection with decentralized identity (DID) solutions for secure credential management across finance, healthcare, and government sectors. The Seoul-based cybersecurity firm will expand its zero-trust architecture and multi-factor authentication offerings globally while participating in FIDO Alliance standards development to drive digital identity adoption.
articles.title: [2026 주목! 보안기업] 라온시큐어 "디지털신뢰 인프라 글로벌 표준 주도"

articles.contents: South Korean companies have gained prominence in global AI rankings, with LG AI Research Institute's K-Exaone model reaching top-tier performance comparable to global open-source standards. The achievement demonstrates domestic AI competitiveness alongside SK Telecom's AEONYX and Upstage's Solar models.
articles.title: "해외도 놀랐다"...허깅페이스 CEO가 주목한 'K-AI' 3곳 어디

articles.contents: Samsung SDS confirmed July 2026 for launching the National AI Computing Center in Gumi, South Korea, a 25,500-acre project requiring 2.5 trillion won investment to provide GPU-intensive computing infrastructure supporting domestic AI development and government digital transformation initiatives.
articles.title: [유미's 픽] 'K-AI 고속도로'는 아직 심사 중…7월 착공 공표한 삼성SDS, 정부도 발 맞출까

articles.contents: South Korea's ETRI developed OmniXtend, a breakthrough memory-expansion technology using Ethernet to solve AI systems' critical memory bottleneck issues, potentially doubling large language model performance while reducing infrastructure costs for next-generation AI computing. The technology enables flexible memory pooling across distributed servers without costly specialized hardware.
articles.title: ETRI, 초대형 AI 메모리 부족 문제 해결…기술이전 추진

articles.contents: South Korea's Fair Trade Commission expanded its digital service investigation authority and strengthened enforcement powers against unfair market practices in the AI software sector, while proposing technology-based verification criteria to replace sales-performance metrics for startup funding. The regulatory overhaul aims to create fairer market conditions and support domestic AI company growth.
articles.title: "실적 0건도 AI 조달 참가·자체입찰은 제재"… 조달청, 대대적 혁신

articles.contents: Samsung SDS will invest 427.3 billion won to build a 60-megawatt AI data center in Gumi, South Korea, expected to begin operations in March 2029, combining hybrid cooling technology and next-generation infrastructure to support enterprise AI workloads. The facility targets high-performance computing demands from AI model training and inference applications.
articles.title: 삼성SDS, 60MW 규모 구미 AI 데이터센터 건립 추진…2029년 가동

articles.contents: NC AI launched VAETKI (Vertical AI Engine for Transformation of Key Industries), a multimodal AI foundation model optimized for Korean language and domestic manufacturing sectors, achieving performance on par with global models like GPT-4 and Llama while reducing inference costs through mixture-of-experts architecture. The 100-billion-parameter model targets finance, manufacturing, and healthcare industries requiring high trust and explainability.
articles.title: NC AI, 산업 맞춤형 AI '배키' 공개…글로벌 SOTA급 성능·한국어 최적화

articles.contents: Artinus launched AI-powered curation tools allowing art collectors and curators to gain personalized insights through expert analysis and semantic understanding of artworks, complementing its rebranded homepage redesign at CES 2026. The Korean art platform's deep learning technology helps users build collections confidently by analyzing visual elements and artistic context.
articles.title: 아트니스, 'AI 큐레이션' 정식 도입...김환기 신년 특별 기획전 개최

articles.contents: South Korean cybersecurity firm S2W published framework research with KAIST in top-tier security journal Computers & Security, using explainable AI and knowledge graphs to structurally analyze network intrusion attack origins and security incident root causes. The approach combines ontology, knowledge graphs, and probabilistic reasoning to identify security vulnerabilities in complex systems.
articles.title: 보안 사고 뿌리, AI가 알려준다…S2W, '통제 가능한' 침입 분석 프레임워크 제시

articles.contents: Samsung Electronics showcased 15 C-Lab startups at CES 2026, including robotics firm RONIK and pet healthcare AI service Sevenriter, demonstrating Samsung's strategy to nurture innovative companies in AI, IoT, and digital health sectors for global market expansion. The initiatives highlight Samsung's broader commitment to supporting next-generation technology entrepreneurs.
articles.title: 삼성전자가 육성한 C랩 스타트업, CES 2026서 글로벌 무대 공략

articles.contents: Alphabet's AI subsidiary DeepMind's AlphaGo surpassed Apple's market capitalization for the first time since 2019, reaching $370.8 billion as the stock gained over 2% on January 7th. AlphaGo's 2025 success in AI business ventures, which drove a 65% stock surge, represents the strongest performance since the 2009 financial crisis, positioning the company ahead of Apple despite recent AI competition concerns.
articles.title: 'AI 강자' 알파벳, 6년 만에 애플 시총 넘었다

articles.contents: Z.ai, a Chinese AI company known for developing GLM language models, is preparing for an initial public offering at a valuation exceeding $560 million. The company aims to capitalize on growing demand for domestically developed AI models in China's competitive AI market.
articles.title: GLM으로 유명한 중국의 Z.ai, IPO 진행 $560M 이상의 가치

articles.contents: Razer unveiled the ZERO Air gaming laptop at CES 2026, weighing just 1.58 kg while delivering 160W dual-channel performance using Intel Panther Lake mobile processors and Nvidia GeForce RTX 50 GPUs. The laptop combines portability with high performance through advanced heat dissipation and features a 15.3-inch OLED screen, solving the long-standing trade-off between gaming performance and device weight.
articles.title: 科氪 | 雷神科技CES 2026速报：新一代“轻型”旗舰游戏本雷神ZERO Air实机首秀

articles.contents: RoboSense and Segway announced autonomous delivery robot 'XiaoGe' at CES 2026, powered by RoboSense's proprietary hand-eye coordination technology combining 3D point cloud data with tactile sensing. The robot can autonomously complete over 20 complex operational steps including packaging, uploading, transporting, unboxing, and delivery without human intervention.
articles.title: 速腾聚创展出全球首款AI机器人“配送小哥”，现场演示自主打包拆包操作｜最前线

articles.contents: Insilico Medicine, an AI-driven drug discovery firm, signed a collaboration deal worth up to $888 million with French pharmaceutical company Servier for cancer drug development. The landmark deal demonstrates major investor confidence in AI-powered drug discovery shortly after Insilico's Hong Kong Stock Exchange IPO.
articles.title: AI Drugmaker Insilico Strikes $888 Million Cancer Drug Deal With Servier

articles.contents: Unable to generate summary - article content is behind paywall and contains only subscription information, not actual news content.
articles.title: Character.ai and Google agree to settle lawsuits over teen suicides

articles.contents: Unable to generate summary - article content is behind paywall and contains only subscription information, not actual news content.
articles.title: KKR to invest $1.5bn into European data centre business

articles.contents: Unable to generate summary - article content is behind paywall and contains only subscription information, not actual news content.
articles.title: China reviews Meta’s $2bn purchase of AI start-up Manus

articles.contents: Swap, an AI-powered e-commerce operating system that unifies returns, shipping, taxes, and payments, raised $100 million in Series C funding co-led by DST Global and ICONIQ at an undisclosed valuation. The platform helps mid-sized brands ($5M-$100M revenue) increase cash retention by 12% and boost sales 111% year-over-year through AI-driven demand prediction and automation.
articles.title: Swap raises $100M from DST, ICONIQ to unify fragmented global e-commerce ops

articles.contents: LMArena, a San Francisco-based AI benchmark platform that crowdsources model evaluations through user comparisons, raised $150 million at a $1.7 billion valuation led by Felicis and UC Investments. The platform's commercial AI Evaluations service reached a $30 million annualized consumption rate within four months of launch.
articles.title: Unicorn alert: LMArena zips $150M at $1.7B valuation to make users the judge of AI performance

articles.contents: Boston Dynamics unveiled an updated humanoid robot Atlas at CES and announced a partnership with Google DeepMind to enhance the robot's cognitive capabilities through AI integration.
articles.title: Boston Dynamics Unveils Humanoid Robot Atlas at CES

articles.contents: Mobileye acquired Mentee Robotics for $900 million to accelerate development of physical AI systems for autonomous driving and humanoid robotics applications.
articles.title: Mobileye to Acquire Mentee Robotics in $900M Deal

articles.contents: OpenAI launched ChatGPT Health, a dedicated space where 230 million weekly users can discuss health and wellness topics with integration to Apple Health and other wellness apps. The feature won't train OpenAI's models and rolls out in coming weeks.
articles.title: OpenAI unveils ChatGPT Health, says 230 million users ask about health each week

articles.contents: Venture capitalists believe 2026 will be the breakthrough year for consumer AI, with opportunities for startups in niche applications despite competition from larger AI platforms like ChatGPT and Meta AI.
articles.title: Where VCs think AI startups can win, even with OpenAI in the game

articles.contents: Anthropic, the Claude AI maker, is raising $10 billion at a $350 billion valuation from Coatue Management and Singapore's GIC, nearly doubling its value from a $183 billion valuation three months prior. The funding is separate from a $15 billion commitment from Nvidia and Microsoft.
articles.title: Anthropic reportedly raising $10B at $350B valuation

articles.contents: Skylight, a bootstrapped company with 1.3 million family users, debuted Calendar 2, a mid-sized digital calendar device using AI to consolidate family schedules, manage grocery lists, plan meals, and digitize paper-based event notifications from schools.
articles.title: Skylight debuts Calendar 2 to keep your family organized

articles.contents: Caterpillar partnered with Nvidia to pilot Cat AI, an AI assistant system on its Cat 306 CR Mini Excavator using Nvidia's Jetson Thor platform to help operators access resources, receive safety tips, and schedule services.
articles.title: Caterpillar taps Nvidia to bring AI to its construction equipment

articles.contents: Intel spinout Articul8 secured over $35 million of a planned $70 million Series B at a $500 million valuation, targeting regulated industries with on-premise AI systems for energy, manufacturing, aerospace, and financial services with $90 million in total contract value from 29 customers.
articles.title: Intel spinout Articul8 raises more than half of $70M round at $500M valuation

articles.contents: Delhi NCR-based Nitro Commerce, an AI-powered marketing platform for direct-to-consumer brands using intent-based targeting, raised $5 million Series A led by Cornerstone Ventures to scale international operations and reach $10 million ARR from current $5 million.
articles.title: Exclusive: Nitro Commerce Raises $5 Mn To Scale International Operations

articles.contents: Infosys partnered with Cognition to deploy Devin, an AI software engineer, across its internal operations and client engagements globally, integrating it with Infosys Topaz Fabric to automate development workflows. The collaboration targets software development acceleration and engineering productivity improvements, with initial deployments in financial services including banking, payments, and capital markets.
articles.title: Infosys to Deploy Cognition’s AI Software Engineer Devin for Enterprises

articles.contents: Keysight Technologies launched AI Software Integrity Builder, a validation solution for AI-enabled systems in safety-critical environments like autonomous vehicles, addressing regulatory compliance with standards such as ISO/PAS 8800 and the EU AI Act. The software analyzes data quality, explains model decisions, and tests inference behavior to ensure safe deployment of AI systems.
articles.title: Keysight Rolls Out Software to Validate Safety-Critical AI

articles.contents: Infosys and Amazon Web Services partnered to integrate Infosys Topaz with Amazon Q Developer, enabling enterprises to enhance software development, HR, recruitment, and vendor management through generative AI. The collaboration targets manufacturing, telecom, financial services, and consumer goods sectors globally with automated documentation and code generation capabilities.
articles.title: Infosys, AWS Partner to Speed Up Enterprise Use of Generative AI

articles.contents: NXP Semiconductors and GE HealthCare partnered to develop edge AI solutions for acute care, unveiling voice-enabled anesthesia delivery systems and intelligent neonatal monitoring concepts at CES 2026. Both systems process data locally on-device using NXP's neural processing units to ensure privacy and real-time performance in operating rooms and neonatal intensive care units.
articles.title: NXP, GE HealthCare Partner to Advance Edge AI for Acute Care at CES 2026

articles.contents: Red Sea Global and Bunat Ventures launched a Saudi-focused AI venture fund targeting 25 early- and growth-stage AI-native startups over three years, providing capital and access to real-world testing infrastructure at tourism destinations The Red Sea and AMAALA. The initiative aims to support Saudi entrepreneurs and Saudi-founded global companies expanding into the Kingdom while strengthening the local AI ecosystem.
articles.title: Red Sea Global, Bunat VC launch Saudi-focused AI venture fund

articles.contents: Saudi proptech startup Aamar raised over $4 million in seed funding to expand its AI-powered platform that automates leasing and asset-finance operations. The company has already served 10,000+ customers and facilitated rental transactions worth SAR 150 million, with plans to scale geographically across Saudi Arabia.
articles.title: Aamar raises $4 million+ seed round to modernise Saudi rental market

articles.contents: Lenovo unveiled Qira, a cross-device ambient intelligence system that integrates at the system level across PCs, tablets, smartphones, and wearables to provide context-aware assistance without requiring users to invoke a separate app. Unlike traditional chatbots, Qira learns user intent over time and orchestrates actions across devices offline, with Motorola launching its own Qira variant.
articles.title: Introducing Lenovo and Motorola Qira, a Personal Ambient Intelligence Designed to Work Across Devices

articles.contents: Nous Research released NousCoder-14B, an open-source AI coding model trained in four days on 48 NVIDIA B200 GPUs, achieving 67.87% accuracy on competitive programming benchmarks. The company published complete training infrastructure and model weights, enabling reproducibility as the open-source community competes with proprietary coding assistants like Anthropic's Claude Code.
articles.title: Nous Research's NousCoder-14B is an open-source coding model landing right in the Claude Code moment

articles.contents: Technology Innovation Institute (TII) Abu Dhabi released Falcon-H1R-7B, a 7-billion-parameter AI reasoning model that matches 14B-47B models in math and coding tasks while maintaining efficiency with a 256k-token context window. The model combines hybrid Transformer and Mamba2 architecture with supervised fine-tuning and reinforcement learning to optimize reasoning performance.
articles.title: TII Abu-Dhabi Released Falcon H1R-7B: A New Reasoning Model Outperforming Others in Math and Coding with only 7B Params with 256k Context Window

articles.contents: Nvidia unveiled its Rubin platform at CES 2026, featuring integrated Vera CPUs, Rubin GPUs, and networking components designed for large-scale AI workloads with up to 10x lower inference costs than its Blackwell architecture. The company also introduced deskside AI supercomputers (DGX Spark and DGX Station) and a context memory storage solution for handling long-context multi-agent AI models.
articles.title: Nvidia at CES 2026: Rubin platform, Vera CPU, GR00T robots, and Alpamayo L4 autonomy

articles.contents: Elon Musk's xAI raised $20 billion from investors including Nvidia, Fidelity, and Qatar Investment Authority, reaching a valuation exceeding $230 billion just two years after its 2023 founding. The funding will expand xAI's data center infrastructure to support training of its Grok AI models and compete with OpenAI and Anthropic.
articles.title: xAI nears $230B valuation in $20B Nvidia-led raise to challenge OpenAI, Anthropic
